import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const SignIn = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const [errors, setErrors] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleFormSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); setErrors(''); try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/signIn', formData); const { token, otpRequired } = response.data; setLoader(false); toast.success('You have been logged in successfully!'); localStorage.setItem('token', token); if (otpRequired) { navigate('/auth/confirmEmail'); } else { navigate('/dashboard'); } } catch (err) { setLoader(false); if (err.response && err.response.data) { const errorResponse = err.response.data; setErrors(errorResponse.msg); toast.error(`Error: ${errorResponse.msg}`); } else { const generalErrorMessage = `There was an error: ${err.message}`; setErrors(generalErrorMessage); toast.error(generalErrorMessage); } console.log('Error occurred during form submission:', err); } }; return (
{errors && typeof errors === 'string' && errors.trim() !== '' && (
